resources.string:
Start Position: Hands slightly wider than shoulders, body in a straight line from head to heels.

Lower: Bend elbows, lower chest to just above the floor.

Push Up: Straighten arms, returning to start position.

Breathing: Inhale down, exhale up.

Reps: Complete 30 push-ups.

Position: Forearms on the ground, elbows under shoulders, legs straight back.

Hold: Keep body in a straight line, engage core.

Time: Hold for 30 seconds to 1 minute.

Position: Stand with arms extended out to the sides.

Circles:Make small circles with your arms.

Direction: Perform for 30 seconds, then switch direction.

Position: Sit on the edge of a chair, hands gripping the edge, legs extended.

Lower: Bend elbows to lower your body.

Push Up: Straighten arms to return to the start.

Reps: Complete 10-15 reps.

Position: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.

Lower: Bend knees and hips, lowering your body.

Push Up: Straighten legs to return to standing.

Reps: Complete 15-20 reps.

Position: Stand with feet hip-width apart.

Step: Take a big step forward with one leg.

Lower: Bend both knees to lower your body.

Push Back: Push through the front heel to return to standing.

Reps: Complete 10-12 reps per leg.

Position: Lie on your back with knees bent, feet flat on the floor.

Lift: Press through your heels to lift your hips towards the ceiling.

Squeeze: Contract your glutes at the top.

 Lower: Lower your hips back down.

Reps: Complete 15-20 reps.

Position: Start on all fours with hands under shoulders and knees under hips.

Kick: Lift one leg, keeping the knee bent, and push the sole of your foot toward the ceiling.

Lower: Lower the leg back down without touching the floor.

Reps: Complete 12-15 reps per leg.

Start Position: Stand with feet together, arms at your sides.

Jump: Jump up, spreading your legs wide and raising your arms overhead.

Land: Jump back to the starting position with feet together and arms at your sides.

Reps: Perform continuously for 1-2 minutes.

Start Position: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart.

Run in Place: Lift one knee at a time towards your chest, alternating quickly.

Arms: Swing your arms in rhythm with your knees.

Reps: Perform continuously for 1-2 minutes.

Start Position: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.

Lower: Squat down, touching the floor with your hands.

Jump: Explosively jump forward, reaching arms overhead.

Land: Land softly and immediately squat down for the next jump.

Reps: Perform 10-12 reps.

Start Position: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart.

Run in Place: Jog in place, kicking your heels up towards your glutes.

Arms: Swing your arms naturally as you run.

Reps: Perform continuously for 1-2 minutes.

Position: Stand on one leg, holding onto a wall for balance if needed.

Grab Ankle: Pull your other foot towards your glutes, holding your ankle.

Hold: Keep knees close together and hold the stretch.

Time: Hold for 20-30 seconds per leg

Position: Stand facing a wall, arms extended for support.

Step Back: Place one foot behind you, keeping heel on the ground.

Lean Forward: Lean forward, pressing hips towards the wall.

Hold: Hold the stretch, feeling it in your calf muscle.

Time: Hold for 20-30 seconds per leg.

Position: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart.

Cross Arm: Bring one arm across your chest.

Support: Use your other arm to gently press the crossed arm closer to your body.

Hold: Hold the stretch, feeling it in your shoulder and upper back.

Time: Hold for 20-30 seconds per arm.

Position: Start on your hands and knees (like a tabletop).

Lift Hips: Press through your palms and lift your hips towards the ceiling.

Form an Inverted V: Straighten your legs as much as possible, forming an inverted V shape with your body.

HeelsDown: Try to press your heels towards the floor.

Hold: Hold the stretch, feeling it in your calves, hamstrings, and back.

Time: Hold for 20-30 seconds.
